name: The Drip Express
description:
*Loud sounds of a steam machine*

Friday, 4th April, 1924. You’re waking up on this fancy train called The Drip Express, on the road to see your beloved. On your way to the bar, you meet a traveler who asks you to help him out. Are you going to be the hero they were waiting for? 

A robbery has occurred on The Drip Express! You, a mere traveler, will have to help another despaired passenger find their precious shoes.

Keep an eye on your surroundings and complete NPC’s quests to find your way to the locked room where the golden shoes are! Your thinking skills will be put to the test while vibing to this Jazzy/Lofi original soundtrack.

Now stamp your ticket and take your seat, the Drip Express is about to depart! 

W/A/S/D: Movement

Mouse: Camera

Left click: Interact

Scroll wheel: Select item

Alexandre Janin - Programming, Game Design, Level Design

Baptiste Figeac - 3D art, Game Design, Level Design

Robin Moreux - 3D art, UI, Game Design, Level Design

Raphaël Marteaux - Original Soundtrack, Sound Design


This game was developed for Mini Jam 88 around the theme "Rush" and the limitation "Tell a story with no text". We hope you enjoy The Drip Express!

Your opinion matters!
